= Wireless Networking =
The VEXPro features an 802.11g wireless adapter.  Wireless networking is currently limited to open, unencrypted networks, but we will be adding support for WEP and WPA encrypted networks soon.

The [LCDMenu LCD Menu] and [WebSite Web Site] sections discuss wireless networking usage and configuration in more detail.
